question_text: What factor most affects the speed of a DSL internet connection?
answer_options: The number of devices on the Wi-Fi network
The signal strength of the coaxial cable
The distance to the central office
The use of a gigabit Ethernet port
correct_answer: The distance to the central office
explanation: DSL speed degrades with distance from the providerâ€™s central office. The closer you are, the faster the speeds.
